name: Parasomnia: No REM
storyline: 10 years have passed since the day your family disappeared. After several nights of insomnia, you decide to see a doctor for a solution. When you get home, you take sleeping pills to sleep better. However, they cause sleepwalking episodes that revive your childhood traumas, making sleep no longer a safe place…
summary: Parasomnia: no REM is a first-person psychological horror game that explores a theme never before seen in this genre: sleepwalking. This theme is represented through the duality between reality and the sleepwalking state, and their interaction with each other. The game’s mechanics and environments adopt characteristics of this type of sleep disorder, offering both innovative and terrifying gameplay.
